name: Fishing Hell
description:
Fishing minigame with a bullet hell twist.

Controls:
> move - arrow keys
> slow move - hold shift + arrow keys
> select - enter
> bomb - x
> hold shift to fast sell items
> reel in - select

Hot Keys:

> F4 - toggle full screen
> F6 - master volume down
> F7 - master volume up
> Delete - toggle FPS

How to play:
> Press fish to start a cast. The single-use upgrade menu will open. This upgrades do not carry over after this cast.
> Weight (displayed on the right) is how much fish you can carry. When you catch enough fish to exceed your weight limit, you will reel the rod back in. 
> Catching certain fish will increase your bait level (displayed on the right). You need higher level bait to catch certain fish. If your bait level is too low, the fish will eat your bait and send you back to bait level 1.

This game uses assets from this amazing artist: 
https://admurin.itch.io/

This game uses assets from this amazing photographer:
https://unsplash.com/photos/lkFDqeMPlmI?utm_source=unsplash&utm_medium=referral&utm_content=creditShareLink

 

SFX and BGM files are completely free to use for any purpose other than reselling or claiming as your own as long as you give me credit.
